Getting CLI help
================

.. include:: _autogenerated/cot/synopsis.txt

.. include:: _autogenerated/cot/description.txt

You can always get detailed help for COT by running ``cot --help``,
``cot <command> --help``, or ``cot help <command>``.

.. include:: _autogenerated/cot/options.txt

.. include:: _autogenerated/cot/examples.txt

.. only:: man

  **cot-edit-properties**\(1), **cot-info**\(1), **cot-inject-config**\(1),
  **cot-install-helpers**\(1)
